entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
